author: Special Correspondent
text:
The police arrested three boys on the charge of attempting to sexually assault a 13-year-old girl at Vellalapatti village, near Vazhappadi, on Saturday evening.

Police sources said that the girl, a class VIII student of the Government Middle School, went to answer nature’s call near the forest area on Saturday evening, when three youths, all labourers in the age group of 16 years, followed her and attempted to rape her under the cover of darkness.

On hearing her cries, people rushed to the spot. Spotting the local people, the three youths fled the scene. Later, the parents of the girl preferred a complaint with the Yethapur Police, who arrested all the three accused.

Hurt in blast

Two young boys suffered injuries in a minor cracker blast at Ayodhyapattanam recently. Hariharan (8) and Karthikeyan (7), sons of Ravi, were playing near their house, when a fire broke out in the garbage dumped nearby. The crackers found in the garbage went off, injuring the boys.
title: Three held for attempt to sexually assault girl
